entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 27.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
